{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = 802.11abgn/ac RTL8822BE Combo Module |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Realtek |model = RTL8822 |submodelappend = |submodel = BE Combo Module |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = April 20, 2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Realtek_RTL8822BE_Combo_Module |sernum = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = M.2 (Key A/E) v1.1 |formfactor = 2230 |vendor_id = 10ec |device_id = b822 |subvendor_id = 1a3b |subdevice_id = 2950 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = TX2-RTL8822BE |icid = 6317A-RTL8822BE |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 90:32:4B |chip1 = Realtek;RTL8822BE;RTL8822BE-CG; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MHF4 |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U98H133 |manuf_rev = .00 |addchip = |flags = Wave2, VHT80, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 4.2, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = reference design |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/29/2016 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :OEM: [[Foxconn]] (Hon Hai) U98H133.[https://www.ebay.es/itm/Realtek-RTL8822CE-Wireless-Wifi-Bluetooth-4-1-NGFF-Card-802-11-b-a-n-ac-/253994404574 00] {{See also|AzureWave Wireless Adapters}} *[[Realtek#ac]] RTL8822BE - PCIe 1.1 (WLAN)/USB 2.0 (BT) :802.11abgn+ac 2T2R (2x2:2), Wave2, MU-MIMO, BT 4.2 *[[Realtek RTL8822BE Combo Module]] :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8822BE Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8822BE TX2-RTL8822BE] (2016-08-29) :IC: 6317A-RTL8822BE; 3.3V/0.5A *[[Lenovo]] Notebook models: :[[Lenovo]] ''IdeaPad'' S540-14IWL Touch (81QX), :S540-14IWL (81ND), S540-14API (81NH), :C340-15IWL (81N5), FLEX-15IWL (81SR) *HP Notebook models: TPN-W139, TPN-W143, :HP TPN-Q217, HP HSN-I25C, HP HSN-Q17C-4 *[http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/10ec/b822 PCI ID: '''10ec:b822''' on ''pci-ids.ucw.cz''] :[[ASUS]] [https://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2392043 ''VivoBook'' 15" X570UD] • ([[10ec]]:b822/[[1a3b]]:2950) 
 Network controller [0280]: Realtek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. 
 Device [10ec:b822] Subsystem: AzureWave Device [1a3b:2950]
 Kernel modules: r8822be
*[[AzureWave AW-CB295NF]] • ([[10ec]]:b822/[[1a3b]]:2951) :''802.11ac WLAN/BT 4.2 Combo NGFF (M.2) Module'' :802.11ac 2T2R, Wave2, MU-MIMO, VHT80, BT 4.2 :M.2 2230 (Key A/E), MHF4, PCIe (WiFi)/USB (BT) :Bluetooth 2.1/3.0 (EDR)/4.2 LE (MCU) ([[13d3]]:3531) :[[Realtek]] RTL8822BE • [https://storage.googleapis.com/wzukusers/user-26561200/documents/5b7d0ef04a284GIqLC6i/AW-CB295NF_DS_B1-V10_STD-20180606.pdf Datasheet] ===Drivers=== *Linux driver: [[rtw88]] • [[rtlwifi_new]] :[https://lwn.net/Articles/768372/ rtw88], [https://github.com/lwfinger/rtlwifi_new rtlwifi_new] ([https://github.com/endlessm/linux/tree/master/drivers/net/wireless/rtl8821ce ''GitHub'']) 
#ifdef CONFIG_RTL8822B
 {PCI_DEVICE(PCI_VENDER_ID_REALTEK, 0xB822), .driver_data = RTL8822B}
:It includes the following drivers: [[rtl8188ee]], [https://marc.info/?l=linux-netdev&m=150299204509065 r8822be], :[[rtl8192ce]], [[rtl8192cu]], [[rtl8192de]], [[rtl8192ee]], [[rtl8192se]], :[[rtl8723ae]], [[rtl8723be]], [[rtl8723de]], [[rtl8821ae]], [[rtl8822be]] ==See also== :;[[Realtek reference design]] *[[Realtek RTL8822BE Combo Module]] (10ec:b822) :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8822BE Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8822BE TX2-RTL8822BE] (2016-08-29) *[[Realtek RTL8822CE Combo Module]] (10ec:c822) :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8822CE Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8822CE TX2-RTL8822CE] (2018-11-02) :IC: 6317A-RTL8822CE, 3.3V/1.5A *[[Realtek RTL8821CE Combo Module]] (10ec:c821) :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8821CE Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8821CE TX2-RTL8821CE] (2016-12-12) *[[Realtek RTL8821AE Combo Module]] (10ec:8821) :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8821AE Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8821AE TX2-RTL8821AE] (2013-07-10) *[[Realtek RTL8821AU Combo Module]] :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8821AU Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8821AU TX2-RTL8821AU] (2014-03-06) [[Category:English Documentation]]
